scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.db:seed: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config sequelize.config.cjs --seeders-path src/db/seeds
scripts.db:reset: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- sh -c 'npx sequelize-cli db:drop --config sequelize.config.cjs || true && npx sequelize-cli db:create --config sequelize.config.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations && node scripts/seed-core.js && node scripts/seed-tenants.js'
scripts.db:migrate:dev: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:test: dotenv -e ../.env.test -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:status:dev: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:status --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.db:migrate:status:test: dotenv -e ../.env.test -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:status --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.db:seed:billing:demo: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- npx sequelize-cli db:seed --config sequelize.config.cjs --seeders-path src/db/seeds --seed 20250912-demo-billing-data.cjs
scripts.db:reset:dev: dotenv -e ../.env.dev -- sh -c 'npx sequelize-cli db:drop --config sequelize.config.cjs || true && npx sequelize-cli db:create --config sequelize.config.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations && node scripts/seed-core.js && node scripts/seed-tenants.js'
scripts.db:reset:test: dotenv -e ../.env.test -- sh -c 'npx sequelize-cli db:drop --config sequelize.config.cjs || true && npx sequelize-cli db:create --config sequelize.config.cjs && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/db/migrations && NODE_ENV=test node scripts/seed-core.js'
